Object.message: The `Object` type is mostly the same as `unknown`. You probably want `Record<string, unknown>` instead. See https://github.com/typescript-eslint/typescript-eslint/pull/848

{}.message: The `{}` type is mostly the same as `unknown`. You probably want `Record<string, unknown>` instead.

object.message: The `object` type is hard to use. Use `Record<string, unknown>` instead. See: https://github.com/typescript-eslint/typescript-eslint/pull/848

types.Function: Use a specific function type instead, like `() => void`.
